set race logic control enabled to

comment.var: if victim gone or timeout occurred: restart
Get fight distances: Khaak Clusters need special treatment
change target for more efficient one
avoid target if too close and a station
target is in range of multiple turrets - stay and let turrets attack
defensive moves to make the ship turn its turrets towards the victim
wait for new victim or the current one to undock
